title: P0.3: Harden Better BibTeX integration
description: Fix type errors in better_bibtex_client.py and add mocked integration tests. search_citekeys slices a dict (TypeError at runtime), get_attachments returns wrong type.

contract.objective: BBT client methods are type-safe and tested against representative JSON-RPC responses
constraints: Existing BBT callers in server.py must not break
Failures degrade gracefully to Zotero API annotation path
